data.name: Gotham City Impostors Free to Play: Luchador Costume
data.detailed_description:
You won't have to wrestle fashion anymore! Themed costumes cannot be unlocked through normal gameplay. Purchase these premium sets and you will gain immediate access to Bats and Jokerz themed versions of each!

  • El Vigilante
  • Championship Bat
  • El Primo
  • Diablo Azul
  • Luchaleggies
  • Técnico Toes
  • El Matador
  • Baneful Boa
  • Mucho Macho
  • Grappler Gauntlets
  • Macho Libres
  • Rudo Riders
  • And more!

fullgame.name: Gotham City Impostors Free to Play

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1.5 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 7 GB Hard Drive Space
  • Video Card: 256MB dedicated memory DX9 Video Card (GeForce 8600 or ATI X1800 or better)
  • DirectX®: DX9
  • Sound: DX9 compatible Sound Controller
  • Additional: Broadband Internet Connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 7 GB Hard Drive Space
  • Video Card: 512MB DX9 High-Performance Video Card (GeForce 8800 or ATI X1900 or better)
  • DirectX®: DX9
  • Sound: DX9 compatible Sound Controller
  • Additional: Broadband Internet Connection
